item.description:
Come help us choose books to read for the next year! This is your chance to lobby for that fantastic novel or memorable memoir or some other book that you just have to share.

 

Please bear in mind that we strive to make our selections accessible by requesting them via interlibrary loan. The library can only get books that are "older", not the latest bestsellers.

 

Hope you can join us! Meantime, feel free to make suggestions in the discussion area. We'll gather up the suggestions and choose the winners on March 4th.
item.name: Book Madness!
